body_text:
What do you think about using jsdoc style comments above the class to describe props?
/**
 * Simple component used to hide/show a block of content
 * based on focus/clicking. Uses a `trigger` property
 * to determine the element which should be used to
 * trigger the menu's appearance.
 *
 * @prop trigger {node} The element the user interacts with to display the dropdown menu
 * @prop children {Array<node>} The content displayed when open
  ...
 */
I think it would be nice to have this in a semi-standard place. Maybe someday we can generate component docs from it. (ha!)
body:
What do you think about using jsdoc style comments above the class to describe props?

```js
/**
 * Simple component used to hide/show a block of content
 * based on focus/clicking. Uses a `trigger` property
 * to determine the element which should be used to
 * trigger the menu's appearance.
 *
 * @prop trigger {node} The element the user interacts with to display the dropdown menu
 * @prop children {Array<node>} The content displayed when open
  ...
 */
```

I think it would be nice to have this in a semi-standard place. Maybe someday we can generate component docs from it. (ha!)
